<item>
<title><![CDATA[Team Canada scores 4-0 men’s hockey victory against Koreans in Pyeongchang ]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/sports/team-canada-scores-4-0-mens-hockey-victory-against-koreans-in-pyeongchang/article38015004/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[Canadians had been stung a day earlier by a 3-2 shootout loss to Czech Republic]]></description>
<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 09:29:04 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38015004</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[Mike Matheson scores twice to lead Florida Panthers over Calgary Flames]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/sports/hockey/mike-matheson-scores-twice-to-lead-florida-panthers-over-calgary-flames/article38014810/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[The beneficiary of all that offence was Panthers’ goaltender Roberto Luongo. In his first appearance since suffering a groin injury on Dec. 4, the 38-year-old made 30 saves for his first win since Nov. 27.]]></description>
<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 01:48:01 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38014810</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Darren Haynes]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[Loui Eriksson scores twice, Anders Nilsson makes 44 saves as Canucks rout Bruins]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/sports/hockey/loui-eriksson-scores-twice-anders-nilsson-makes-44-saves-as-canucks-rout-bruins/article38014784/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[Daniel Sedin, Sven Baertschi, Nic Dowd, and Bo Horvat also scored for Vancouver (23-30-6), which used four first-period goals to blow the game open early. The win snapped a two-game losing streak for the Canucks, who have just two victories in their last eight games.]]></description>
<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 01:44:30 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38014784</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Jim Morris]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[Jazz rookie Donovan Mitchell wins Slam Dunk Contest to highlight NBA All-Star Saturday]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/sports/basketball/jazz-rookie-donovan-mitchell-wins-slam-dunk-contest-to-highlight-nba-all-star-saturday/article38014693/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[The Suns’ Devin Booker won the Three-Point Contest by scoring a record 28 points of a possible 34 in the final round and the Nets’ Spencer Dinwiddie defeated the Bulls’ Lauri Markkanen to win the Skills Challenge]]></description>
<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 23:10:02 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38014693</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[Canada’s Kevin Koe drops second straight game in Olympics curling with loss to Switzerland]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/sports/olympics/canadas-kevin-koe-curling-drops-second-straight-game-at-winter-olympics-in-loss-to-switzerland/article38014685/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[Although Koe came back with a deuce in the second end, the Swiss kept adding to their lead with the Canadians unable to gain any ground.]]></description>
<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 22:34:36 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38014685</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[Evgeni Malkin powers Penguins over Maple Leafs in victory, their 11th straight win in Pittsburgh]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/sports/hockey/evgeni-malkin-powers-penguins-over-maple-leafs-in-victory-their-11th-straight-win-in-pittsburgh/article38014676/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[Carl Hagelin, Zach Aston-Reese, Olli Maatta and Bryan Rust also scored for Pittsburgh, which has won four straight. Sidney Crosby had a home point streak stopped at 10 games.]]></description>
<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 22:19:41 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38014676</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[Dan Scifo]]></dc:creator>
</item>
<item>
<title><![CDATA[Pyeongchang 2018: Freestyle skier wins bronze, Team Canada nets 4-0 hockey win against Korea]]></title>
<link>https://www.theglobeandmail.com/sports/olympics/2018-pyeongchang-winter-olympics-day-9/article38014181/?cmpid=rss1</link>
<description><![CDATA[Alex Beaulieu-Marchand notched a bronze medal in the men's freestyle skiing slopestyle event. In curling, Canada's men's and women's rinks split their games against Switzerland]]></description>
<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 18:04:43 -0500</pubDate>
<guid isPermaLink="false">38014181</guid>
<dc:creator><![CDATA[GLOBE STAFF]]></dc:creator>
</item>
